title: आईस बॉक्स में रखे बच्चे के शव का वीडियो झूठी बच्चा चोरी की अफवाहों के साथ हुआ वायरल

vclaim: Children kidnapped, frozen in ice and put in coffins ready to be transported to various secret places for their organs to be harvested and sold. This is current world where everyone wants to be rich through every means. Watch out in your area. 💔😭 pic.twitter.com/jAq9xSV9rb
